abstract: Defense attorney Robert Massi, testifying at hearing to overturn 1991 murder conviction of John D Bunn, recounts earlier case in which retired New York City Police Detective Louis Scarcella was found to have coached robbery victim before lineup; misconduct allegation is among many connected to Scarcella, whose work has been subject of review by Brooklyn district attorney’s office.
lead_paragraph: The allegations came at a State Supreme Court hearing for a man convicted of murder after an investigation by Louis Scarcella, a retired New York detective whose casework is under review.

headline.main: Scarcella Coached Robbery Victim Before Lineup, Lawyer Says at a Hearing
headline.print_headline: Detective Coached Robbery Victim Before Lineup, Lawyer Says at a Hearing
